content.text: This is a test just to get a conversation going so I can test.
Hello! I'm ready to help you with any software engineering tasks. What would you like to work on?

message.content: Okay, so I am able to resume a conversation in this folder. When I try to resume a conversation in my project folder, you crash and I have to kill the terminal session. What is different between the folders?

content.text: I'll help you investigate why resuming conversations works in this folder but crashes in your project folder. Let me examine the differences between these locations.
